verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
They that wait upon the Lord
Shall renew their strength.
They shall mount up with wings as eagles.
They shall run and not grow weary;
They shall walk and not faint.
Teach me Lord, teach me Lord to wait.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Teach me Lord to wait, down on my knees.
Till in Your own good time,
You will answer my plea.
Teach me not to rely on what others do,
But to wait in prayer for the answer from You.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Los que esperan en Jehova
Nuevas fuerzas tendran

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Alzaran sus alas como aguilas
Correran sin fatigarse, caminaran sin desmayar.
